thread.title: ATA Welcomes Omnitracs as New Featured Product Provider
thread.title_full: ATA Welcomes Omnitracs as New Featured Product Provider

author: admin
title: ATA Welcomes Omnitracs as New Featured Product Provider
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: American Trucking Associations 
ARLINGTON, Va., Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Today, American Trucking Associations welcomed Omnitracs, a fleet management solutions supplier, as its latest Featured Product provider. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20140523/90962 
"Making sure your drivers have real-time access to the most current information on safe and reliable truck routes is of paramount importance for motor carriers," said ATA President and CEO Bill Graves. "With GPS products from companies like Omnitracs, our drivers can do their jobs more efficiently and safely. That's why we are very pleased to welcome Omnitracs as a Featured Product provider." 
In addition to their portfolio of fleet management technology solutions, Omnitracs' flagship Navigation product, being launched at the ATA Management Conference and Exhibition, features route optimization and re-routing with its industry-leading database of more than 250,000 customers and 1 billion data points. With optimized driver-friendly user interface, paired with fast, near real-time updates and extensive fleet configuration options Omnitracs Navigation provides critical navigational information to drivers. 
"Omnitracs Navigation, first and foremost, is a service. We're more than turn by turn instructions, we're more than a navigation client on a mobile device. Omnitracs has a data publishing and data editing process in place so as we get feedback from the driver, the data is updated and pushed out, meaning the service is always current and creating the best possible experience for the driver," said Rick Turek, chief navigation scientist. 
Demonstrations of Omnitracs Navigation will be conducted at the ATA Management Conference and Exhibition in Philadelphia at booth #609. 
A complete list of ATA Featured Product companies is available at www.atabusinesssolutions.com or by calling 866-821-3468. 
Omnitracs, LLC is a global pioneer of fleet management, routing and predictive analytics solutions for private and for-hire fleets. Omnitracs' nearly 1,000 employees deliver software-as-a-service-based solutions to help more than 50,000 private and for-hire fleet customers manage nearly 1,500,000 mobile assets in more than 70 countries. The company pioneered the use of commercial vehicle telematics over 25 years ago and serves today as a powerhouse of innovative, intuitive technologies. Omnitracs transforms the transportation industry through technology and insight, featuring best-in-class solutions for compliance, safety and security, productivity, telematics and tracking, transportation management (TMS), planning and delivery, data and analytics, and professional services. 
American Trucking Associations is the largest national trade association for the trucking industry. Through a federation of 50 affiliated state trucking associations and industry-related conferences and councils, ATA is the voice of the industry America depends on most to move our nation's freight. Follow ATA on Twitter or on Facebook . Trucking Moves America Forward . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ata-welcomes-omnitracs-as-new-featured-product-provider-300152813.html 
SOURCE American Trucking Associations
